metadata.title: CVE-2023-44271 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Pillow before 10.0.0. It is a Denial of Servicethat uncontrollably allocates memory to process a given task, potentiallycausing a service to crash by having it run out of memory. This occurs fortruetype in ImageFont when textlength in an ImageDraw instance operates ona long text argument.

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
pillow-python2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
